name: Hole Canyon
description:
A rare opportunity to do an actual R rated stemming canyon in the Roost. Main Hole slot is 800 feet in length and almost entirely stemming off the ground up to 30 feet. A couple easy silos. East fork is 400 feet in length, similar stemming, and 1 required rappel from a chockstone, then a downclimb into a pool that can be mostly avoided by hanging on a flake and swinging right to a sandbar. Each one individually is 3AIR. Combined they can be done in 2.5 to 3.5 hours.
